content.rendered:
Medical Coder/Billing | Tulsa, Oklahoma
  • Full-Time, Monday-Friday 8:00am-5:00pm
  • 3+ years experience as a coder/biller
  • Experience with billing patient encounters
  • Must have strong experience with patient and payer A/R
  • Work Comp experience a plus
  • Must have experience with Medicare, Medicaid, Tricare and Commercial payers
  • Will be responsible for billing and A/R follow of claims
  • CPC certified preferred but not necessary
  • $14-$17/hour
